wellbeing_links.description: Use this form as a means of getting help for additional course content and material that you need. Before you use this form, head over to the Student Help Page for resources that the university already provides.
wellbeing_links.label: Additional Help Form

wellbeing_links.description: Use this form to emphasise your stress levels at the moment on the course your doing. This will allow course reps to gain insights on how students are doing as a whole anonymously and bring about improvements.
wellbeing_links.label: Report Stress Level
